snippet.title: Ghostland Yard - Reveal trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/2051130/Ghostland_Yard/

Uncover the truth about the Ghostland Yard investigators disappearance in this challenging 2D precision platformer. Travel through 6 differents environment in more than 130 hand-crafted levels to find your friends!

Follow us on Twitter : https://twitter.com/studio_obelisk
